title: Patria - Nihil Est Monastica (2013)
description:
PATRIA's wrath was unleashed by Mantus (All instruments) & Triumphsword (Vocals) through the first demo "Hills of Mist" in 2008. With the purpose to create a Necro Raw Metal in the vein of the early 90' Black Metal acts mixed with dark and ambient symphonies, they came in the middle of a failed modern world offering to the real darkness worshippers an extremely honest music straightly dedicated to their underground souls.

In 2009 the debut album "Hymns of Victory and Death" was released by the russian label Monokrom, getting a quite positive reviews from the specialized media and maniacs around the globe. The second album "Sovereign Misanthropy" was recorded and released in 2010, once and again by the great Monokrom, showing that same archaical feeling from the first one, but more into a ritualistic, weird and experimental metal way. Thirstily inspired they went fast through a MCD entitled "Gloria Nox Aeterna" out in September of 2010 by Monokrom, containing four exclusive songs plus the demo "Hills of Mist" and the videos "Culto das Sombras" and "Old Blood Legacy" as bonus.

In 2011 PATRIA have signed to the cult french label Drakkar Productions and released in June of the same year its third full-length opus "Liturgia Haeresis" in DIGI, LP and DOWNLOAD. The portuguese label Heavy Steel Records released the cassette edition. This material is still collecting very positive reviews from the underground zines to the major magazines, beyond a fantastic support from the real Black Metal manics around the planet.

Now in 2012 we recently finished the recordings of our upcoming album "Nihil Est Monastica" that will be out in the first semester of 2013, once and again by Drakkar Productions [France]. The tenuous line between necro Black Metal and experimental avant-garde music in an epic journey when the south american madness meets the apocalyptical scandinavian vein. Twisted, dirty & melodic in a very unique way! Definitely not for all ears!!! Cover art by Costin Chioreanu [Darkthrone, Ulver, Aura Noir].


Line-Up
Triumphsword [Vocals]
Mantus [All Instruments]
Igniis Inferniis [Live Guitar]
W.S. Vulkan [Live Bass]
Abyssius [Live Drums]
